Field Detail

FIRST_ELMT_OFFSET

static final int FIRST_ELMT_OFFSET
In a "normal" (aka not embedded) doc, this will be the offset of the first element. In an embedded doc because we use ByteBuffers to avoid unecessary copying the offset must be manually set in _doc_start_offset

See Also:
